creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: old sepia-toned photograph of standing elderly Native American man wearing a cap, wrinkled shirt, beaded necklaces and beaded knee bands, and holding a pipe in each hand, flanked by two young boys wearing Western clothing; text in black at top: "Land where my fathers died"; text written at bottom in white and black pigment
markings: on back at bottom, in pencil: 1/10
signed: on back at bottom, in pencil: Land Where My Father\'s Died  Tom Jones  2002
title: Dear America: Land Where My Fathers Died
